Setup: 
- Adjust the seat height of the leg curl machine so that the knee pad aligns with your lower leg, just above your ankles. Adjust the backrest if necessary for comfort. 
Positioning: 
- Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet extended forward, resting against the footpad. Your knees should be aligned with the pivot point of the machine. 
Adjustments: 
- Adjust the weight stack to a suitable resistance level for your strength and fitness level. Start with a lighter weight if you're new to the exercise.

Activation: 
- Engage your core muscles to stabilize your torso and pelvis throughout the movement. 
Curling Motion: 
- Exhale and flex your knees, curling your lower legs towards your glutes by contracting your hamstrings. Keep your heels pointed towards your glutes.
Controlled Lowering: \n- Inhale and slowly lower your lower legs, extending your knees and straightening your legs. \n- Maintain control over the movement to prevent the weight from slamming down.
